en.bdb: One Oankaar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor
One Oankaar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

verse.gurmukhi: lylY mjnUM AwskI chu ckI jwqI[
verse.unicode: ਲੇਲੈ ਮਜਨੂੰ ਆਸਕੀ ਚਹੁ ਚਕੀ ਜਾਤੀ।

en.bdb: The lovers Lana and Majanu are well known in all the quarters of the world.

transliteration.english: lelai majanoo(n) aasakee chahu chakee jaatee|
transliteration.hindi: लेलै मजनूँ आसकी चहु चकी जाती।
transliteration.en: lelai majanoo(n) aasakee chahu chakee jaatee|
transliteration.hi: लेलै मजनूँ आसकी चहु चकी जाती।
transliteration.ipa: lelæ məd͡ʒənuŋ əɑsəki t͡ʃəh t͡ʃəki d͡ʒɑt̪i.
transliteration.ur: لےلَے مجنُوں آسکیِ چهُ چکیِ جاتیِ۔

verse.gurmukhi: soriT bIjw gwvIAY jsu suGVw vwqI[
verse.unicode: ਸੋਰਠਿ ਬੀਜਾ ਗਾਵੀਐ ਜਸੁ ਸੁਘੜਾ ਵਾਤੀ।

en.bdb: The excellent song of Sorath and Bija is sung in every direction.

transliteration.english: soraTh beejaa gaaveeaai jas sughaRaa vaatee|
transliteration.hindi: सोरठि बीजा गावीऐ जसु सुघड़ा वाती।
transliteration.en: soraTh beejaa gaaveeaai jas sughaRaa vaatee|
transliteration.hi: सोरठि बीजा गावीऐ जसु सुघड़ा वाती।
transliteration.ipa: sɔrəʈʰ bid͡ʒɑ Gɑʋiæ d͡ʒəs sʊGʰəɽɑ ʋɑt̪i.
transliteration.ur: سورٹھ بیِجا گاویِاَے جس سُگھڑا واتیِ۔

verse.gurmukhi: ssI puMnUM dosqI huie jwiq AjwqI[
verse.unicode: ਸਸੀ ਪੁੰਨੂੰ ਦੋਸਤੀ ਹੁਇ ਜਾਤਿ ਅਜਾਤੀ।

en.bdb: The love of Sassi and Punnü, though of different castes, is everywhere spoken of.

transliteration.english: sasee pu(n)noo(n) dhosatee hui jaat ajaatee|
transliteration.hindi: ससी पुँनूँ दोसती हुइ जाति अजाती।
transliteration.en: sasee pu(n)noo(n) dhosatee hui jaat ajaatee|
transliteration.hi: ससी पुँनूँ दोसती हुइ जाति अजाती।
transliteration.ipa: səsi pʊŋnuŋ d̪ɔsət̪i hʊeɪ d͡ʒɑt̪ əd͡ʒɑt̪i.
transliteration.ur: سسیِ پُنُّوں دوستیِ هُا جات اجاتیِ۔

verse.gurmukhi: myhIvwl no sohxI nY qrdI rwqI[
verse.unicode: ਮੇਹੀਵਾਲ ਨੋ ਸੋਹਣੀ ਨੈ ਤਰਦੀ ਰਾਤੀ।

en.bdb: The fame of Sohni who used to swim the Chenab river in the hope to meet Mahival is well known.

transliteration.english: meheevaal no sohanee nai taradhee raatee|
transliteration.hindi: मेहीवाल नो सोहणी नै तरदी राती।
transliteration.en: meheevaal no sohanee nai taradhee raatee|
transliteration.hi: मेहीवाल नो सोहणी नै तरदी राती।
transliteration.ipa: mehiʋɑl nɔ sɔhəɳi næ t̪ərəd̪i rɑt̪i.
transliteration.ur: مےهیِوال نو سوهݨیِ نَے تردیِ راتیِ۔

verse.gurmukhi: rWJw hIr vKwxIAY Ehu iprm prwqI[
verse.unicode: ਰਾਂਝਾ ਹੀਰ ਵਖਾਣੀਐ ਓਹੁ ਪਿਰਮ ਪਰਾਤੀ।

en.bdb: Ranjha and Hir are renowned for the love they bore each other.

transliteration.english: raa(n)jhaa heer vakhaaneeaai oh piram paraatee|
transliteration.hindi: राँझा हीर वखाणीऐ ओहु पिरम पराती।
transliteration.en: raa(n)jhaa heer vakhaaneeaai oh piram paraatee|
transliteration.hi: राँझा हीर वखाणीऐ ओहु पिरम पराती।
transliteration.ipa: rɑⁿəɖ͡ʐɑ hir ʋəkʰɑɳiæ oəh pɪrəm pərɑt̪i.
transliteration.ur: راںجھا هیِر وکھاݨیِاَے اوهُ پرم پراتیِ۔

en.bdb: But superior to all is the love the disciples bear their Guru.They sing it at the ambrosial hour of morning.
